Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Purple Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Hylian Shield#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Slingshot#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Hookshot#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Slingshot#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #the Stone of Agony#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.
